page.title: 14Art and Craft in Long Marton
page.content: Emily's family have lived in Long Mar- ton for seven and a half years.Her father paints and her mother runs an antique shop in Carlisle and sometimes works with the National Opera Company which she once did full time. Her father paints with oil.He works whenever he can and paints many diff- erent things,including a picture of Emily and a self-portrait.He has painted abroad as well as in England but has only been painting full time. Her mother bought the materials and supervised the making of costumes for the Opera and still helps them part time.She says it is nerve wracking and tiring but great fun.She was working full time with the Opera for eight years but never worked abroad. She has a collection of costumes which we borrow and alter for school plays.
